import React, { LegacyRef, useRef, useState, RefObject } from 'react' import Hamburger from '../../assets/Hamburger/Hamburger' import showControl from '../../assets/showControl/showControl' import Container from '../Container/Container' import LoginMenu from '../LoginMenu/LoginMenu' import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar' import NavbarContainer from '../Navbar/NavbarContainer' import user from '../../images/user.png' import { FaUser, FaShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fa"; import LoginMenuContainer from '../LoginMenu/LoginMenuContainer' import CartMenuContainer from '../CartMenu.tsx/CartMenuContainer' import HamburgerMenuContainer from '../HamburgerMenu/HamburgerMenuContainer' type TProps = { logoText: string isCartMenuOpen: boolean setIsCartMenuOpen: (isCartMenuOpen: boolean) => void shoppingCart: RefObject | null } const Header: React.FC = React.memo(( { logoText, isCartMenuOpen, setIsCartMenuOpen, shoppingCart, }) => { const toggleCartMenu = (): void => { setIsCartMenuOpen(!isCartMenuOpen) } return (
{logoText}
) }) export default Header
